mapper.select: select a.Cbno, a.cbtitle, a.cbthumnail, a.cbcontents1, a.cbcontents2, a.cbimg1, a.cbimg2, a.cbimg3, a.cbimg4, a.cbimg5, a.cbaddr1, a.cbaddr2, a.cbupdatedate, b.lno from cultureboard as a, localkr as b where a.lno = b.lno and cbno > 0 order by lno asc limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.number}

select a.cbno, a.cbtitle, a.cbthumnail, a.cbcontents1, a.cbcontents2, a.cbimg1, a.cbimg2, a.cbimg3, a.cbimg4, a.cbimg5, a.cbaddr1, a.cbaddr2, a.cbupdatedate, b.lno from cultureboard as a, localkr as b where a.lno = b.lno and cbno = #{cbno}
SELECT COUNT(cbno) FROM cultureboard WHERE cbno > 0
